Description: The dataset's globally unique identifier.
The publishing organization of the dataset.
The organization responsible for the dataset content and its maintenance.
The title of the dataset.
A longer description of the dataset project.
Conceptualized aspects (e.g., geography, taxonomy) of the dataset project.
Link to the dataset meta information.
Date of dataset creation.
Mapping Notes: Only date before 'T' in ISO Datetime

Description: Date of last dataset update.
Mapping Notes: Only date before 'T' in ISO Datetime

Description: Persons that contributed to the dataset, e.g. as translators.
Mapping Notes: Usually comma-separated strings.

Description: Authors or editors of dataset.
Mapping Notes: Usually comma-separated strings.

Description: The public license used for the dataset publication.
Specified conditions and restrictions for subsequent data usage.

Mapping Notes: Value: TermsOfUseStatement

Description: Specified way how to cite the dataset.

Mapping Notes: Value: Citation

Description: Terms describing the taxonomic scope of the dataset.
Terms describing the geoecological scope of the dataset.
Data content owners are regarded as their authors.
Mapping Notes: Organization mapped to affiliation if owner includes a Person as well..

Description: Data content owners are regarded as their authors.

Mapping Notes: Mapped to the number preceding the decimal point.
Mapped to the number after the decimal point.
Located at the end of the version specification.
Only date before 'T' in ISO Datetime

Description: URL of the dataset source (e.g., download link or query interface).

Mapping Notes: Only if URL does not end with '.zip'.
Only if URL ends with '.zip'.
Only if URL ends with '.zip'. Value: application/zip

Description: URL of the image symbolizing the database project.
IDs of a unit.
Mapping Notes: All IDs are mapped to BioSample elements in about.

Description: Code of the institution where the collection is located.
Mapping Notes: In type BioSample. First part of the triple ID.

Description: Code of the collection to which the unit belongs.
Mapping Notes: In type BioSample. Second part of the triple ID.

Description: ID of the unit.
Mapping Notes: In type BioSample. Third part of the triple ID.

Description: Globally unique identifier of the unit.
Mapping Notes: In type BioSample.

Description: Globally unique identifier of the unit.
Mapping Notes: In type BioSample. If GUID is a URL, add GUID to url element in addition

Description: URL of the unit.
Taxon information about a unit.
Name of a taxon of higher rank.
Mapping Notes: In type Taxon.
In type Taxon.

Description: Species name of the unit.
Mapping Notes: In type Taxon.
In type Taxon. If one or more blanks, it's "Species". Else "Genus".

Description: Object or entity described by this unit.
Type or class of material represented by this unit.
Multimedia objects related to the unit.
Mapping Notes: Mapped to the associatedMedia property of Dataset.

Description: Size of file in kB.
Mapping Notes: With appended "kB".

Description: Specification of licenses that apply to the use of the multimedia objects.
Name of the person that created the multimedia object.
Start of period of collection event.
Mapping Notes: If ISODateTimeEnd exists, mapped in front of "/".

Description: End of period of collection event.
Mapping Notes: If ISODateTimeBegin exists, mapped behind "/".

Description: Collector organization.
Mapping Notes: Organization mapped to affiliation if gathering agent includes a Person as well.

Description: Collector person.
Name(s) of collector(s).
Mapping Notes: Usually comma-separated name strings.

Description: Location of the collection event.
Coordinates of the collection event.
Mapping Notes: Map to the same Place used for LocalityText.

Description: Country information of the location of the collection event.
Mapping Notes: Map to a separate Place.

Description: A bounding box that encompasses all coordinates.
Mapping Notes: Map to a single Place.
Extract the most western and eastern longitude.
Extract the most northern and southern latitude.

Description: Minimum and maximum altitude values in the dataset in meters.

Mapping Notes: Value: Elevation
Value: https://schema.org/elevation
Value: m
If UnitOfMeasurement does not exist or equals 'm'.
If UnitOfMeasurement does not exist or equals 'm'.

Description: Minimum and maximum depth values in the dataset in meters.

Mapping Notes: Value: Depth
Value: https://schema.org/depth
Value: m
If UnitOfMeasurement does not exist or equals 'm'.
If UnitOfMeasurement does not exist or equals 'm'.

Description: A work that is the unit information source.

Mapping Notes: Type URL if GUID starts with 'http'.

Description: A work that cites this unit.
